fulltext:
TRAN LE NGUYEN VU                
E-mail: tranlenguyenvu911@gmail.com 
Gender: Male 
Date of Birth: 12 September, 1988 
Marital Status: Single 
Nationality: Vietnamese 
Mobile Phone: (093) 2755778 
Address: 86/1/5A Thich Quang Duc St, Ward 6, Phu Nhuan Dist, Ho Chi Minh City, 
Vietnam 
Objectives 
To be a marketing communication strategic manager to leadership, team 
management with full skills, ability and performance communication marketing mindset 
focus on data driven, acquire user to generate revenues achievement. 
Education 
Main major: 
MARKETING 
9/2009 – 4/2012 : Marketing, Van Hien University (BA) 
10/ 2010 – 3/2011   : Digital Marketing, Vietnam Marcom (certificate 9 months) 
ENGLISH 
2007 – 2011   : English International Program, VUS-ETSC (4 years,)  
Experience 
Performance Marketing Manager – Head Of Performance 
LINE Corp [From May 2018 – August 2019] – OTT Technology 
www.linecorp.com 
 
Lead performance marketing channels and media buying strategy focused on 
monthly active users growth  
 
Propose performance marketing strategy to manage day-to-day optimize 
performance campaign  
 
Media planning with media/social media services, marketing analytics, products to 
build digital class acquisition funnels and measurable marketing programs fueling 
growth  
 
Help prioritize marketing spend and ensure the optimal allocation of low budgets  
 
Optimize acquisition campaigns by analyzing data sets and targeted right 
audience groups  
 
Ability to develop new campaign strategies to drive increased performance  
Identify trends and insights to maximize campaign KPIs 
 
Product Marketing Portfolio: www.oxii.vn  
 
Achievement: Media Campaign 4,630,000 MAUs with 115,000$ budgets  
Founder 
CE0& Founder  
Room Education [From Jan 2016 – Present] – O2O Education 
www.droom.vn  
 
Create/execution marketing communication strategy with brand attribution to 
acquire customer to enroll marketing courses 
 
Consulting internally and externally, developing the business case, establishing work 
plans to meet strategic objectives. 
 
Ensuring operational objectives are met, managing the Droom team to meet 
revenues objectives and develop as professionals 
 
Using CRM student data to manage to outcomes, quality assuring to retain 
customer for up-sales  
 
Event organizer: Performance Marketing Workshop 2016 
 
Brand Marketing Portfolio: www.droom.vn , www.facebook.com/droomvietnam  
 
Achievement: 250,000$ revenues 2016 – 2019 
Senior Marketing Manager – Head of Marketing 
ME Corp [From Sep 2016 – Dec 2017] – Game Mobile Online 
www.mecorp.vn  
 
Ability to develop innovative, creative marketing ideas and carry through from 
marketing communication concept to execution in an omni-channel capacity. 
 
Profitably acquire new  user through online PR, social media, search engine 
marketing, display advertising, and other integrated marketing programs for driving 
scale of brand volumes and mobile app install (ROI) 
 
Manage the deployment of brand content, new product launches, marketing 
channel management and game promotion activities to improve conversion rate. 
 
Increase customer retention and pay rate, length time user value through effective 
use of database marketing/CRM techniques and targeted email marketing, 
crossing app and retargeting campaign.  
 
Measure campaign performance and adjust tactics as appropriate throughout the 
life of the campaign to ensure success 
 
Viral Marketing Portfolio: www.youtube.com/watch?v=dgdt3J_caeU&t=195s  
 
Achievement: Mobile Game Online App: MU Nextgen, 470,000 app installs/546,000 
KPI app installs (647,000$/1,000,000$ KPI revenues)  
Digital Manager – Head Of Digital Sales 
Prudential Finance [From Aug 2015 – July 2016] – Finance/Banking 
www.prudentialfinance.com.vn  
 
Lead and propose digital new channel to best leverage opportunities in the 
digital/mobile arena for increasing scale of sales volumes. 
 
Participate in digital performance strategy development and execute to drive lead 
customer acquisition to consumer loan. 
 
Ad tracking/platform analytic progress of strategy/ad tactic deployment, in terms of 
spending, platforms, channels, return on investment and provide strategic advice to 
Marketing team. 
 
Work as digital sales expert to define qualified lead standard in CRM, support tele-
sales approach prospect customer for loan application. 
 
Measure and track effectiveness of key campaigns/ channels, with emphasis on 
“real time” campaign management. 
 
Manage, execute, track performance& lead generation campaign. 
 
Digital Marketing Porfolio: https://www.prudentialfinance.com.vn/vi/san-
pham.pru#product-1 
 
Achievement: Digital Sales: 500,000$ revenues 
Digital Media Manager – Head Of Digital Media 
Mirum Viet Nam [From April 2013 – to May 2015] – Creative Agency 
www.mirumagency.com  
 
Media agency management: media strategic planning and executed 
buying/negotiation for all media with a focus on client brief, digital innovation 
thru connection planning discipline lenses. 
 
Developed digital media strategy to meet client business objective toward to 
campaign/communication objective effectiveness.  
 
Lead analyses, deliver data insights, provide actionable recommendations, and 
foster innovation across a wide range of digital strategic initiatives and marketing 
issues. 
 
Set KPI& budget, measurement for digital communication campaign (CPM/CPD, 
CPC, CPA) 
 
Brand portfolio of FMCG/F&B/Banking/Oil: Pepsi Brands, TXKD, Dr Thanh, Kit Kat, 
Techcombank,  Mentos, Chupa Chups, Nivea, Rexona, Total, Oppo, etc. 
 
Performance Marketing Campaign Porfolio: 
www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tgm1G8JflKU  
 
Achievement: Media Team 230,000$ revenues 2013 – 2015 
Senior Online Marketing - SEO Expert  
TPF Vietnam Rep.Office [From October 2011 – April 2013] – Merchandise Retail 
www.tpf.com.au 
 
SEO execution for internal & external TPF Websites. 
 
Responsibilities include keyword research (discovery and expansion), review and 
editing of creative copy 
 
Planning and delivering CRM strategies across the CRM platform for 
encouraging customer retention and customer loyalty. 
 
Facebook Ad lead generation Ad campaigns, as well as track, analyze, and 
optimize Lead Gen campaigns across Facebook.  
 
Track, report, and analyze website analytics and PPC initiatives and campaigns 
Skills 
 
Open-mind and Leadership - team spirit. 
 
Strategic and logical thinking. 
 
Good management and operation skill 
Understanding Marketing Models, channels and Tools 
A team player as well as a digital trainer. 
Have a high sense of responsibility and straight-forward. 
Dynamic, creative, new ideas and catching digital trends. 
 
 
 
 
Interesting 
 
Reading Book& magazine: Strategic Brand Management, Mobile Data insight, 
VN Digital Consumer Insight, VN Digital Landscape etc 
 
Reading news: Tuoitre, Thanhnien, Dantri.com, Vneconomy.vn, Cafef.vn, , etc 
 
Playing PC Games: half-life, medieval total war, etc 
My projects can share, please visit: 
https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1pe4EolxZOjsyZzOy_pAuQqy7y0hlRMj
